shortDescription: Hire top AI talent or find global IT jobs on the go.
longDescription: Zion connects companies with top AI freelancers and helps professionals find global IT roles. With AI matching, a smart resume builder, and 1-click hiring flows, get more done from your phone.

testimonials.author: Priya S.
testimonials.quote: Filled a critical role in 48 hours using Zion mobile.

testimonials.author: Carlos M.
testimonials.quote: Found remote gigs fast. The resume builder is a win.
